main_title: Berlin Wall's Collapse: A Historic Turning Point
hook: [excited] On November 9, 1989, a roar erupted in Berlin as the wall separating East and West crumbled! This 96-mile barrier had divided families and ideologies since 1961.
description: Witness the day the Berlin Wall fell and ignited democracy across Europe! #BerlinWall #History #Democracy #Unity #1989
